H0.text: In the children’s television series ‘Ivor the Engine’ what is the name of the dragon. Ember

H1.text: In the children’s television series ‘Ivor the Engine’ what is the name of the dragon. Scorch

H2.text: In the children’s television series ‘Ivor the Engine’ what is the name of the dragon. Blaze

H3.text: In the children’s television series ‘Ivor the Engine’ what is the name of the dragon. Idris

A4.text: Functional programming language Idris was named after the dragon in the show.
